description: Learn how to make a healthier tartare sauce to accompany your favourite seafood dishes. Ready in just five minutes, it's the easiest thing you'll make tonight.
keywords: Dipping sauce,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Jun 2021,Lemon,Sesame free,Fakeaway,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Healthier Tartare Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs drained capers in vinegar, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Combine yoghurt, mustard, vinegar, capers, and three-quarters of the parsley and zest in a small bowl. Top with remaining parsley and zest. Serve with Healthier air-fryer fish & chips.
